verse:
मुनयो ह वै ब्राह्मणमूचुः ।
कः परमो देवः ।
कस्मान मृत्युर्बिभेति ।
कस्य विज्ञानेनाखिलं विज्ञातं भवति।
केनेदं विश्वं संसरतीति ॥

terms.मुनयो ह वै ब्राह्मणमूचुः । (mudrayo ha v: The sages said to the Brahmana.
terms.कस्य विज्ञानेनाखिलं विज्ञातं भवति। (kasy: By whose knowledge does everything become known?
terms.केनेदं विश्वं संसरतीति ॥ (kenedam vishva: By whom is this universe bound and moved?
terms: By whom is this universe bound and moved?

meaning: Meaning:The sages asked the Brahmana:These questions reflect the quest for ultimate knowledge and the seekers' desire to know the source and nature of existence, the power that governs life, and the purpose of human existence.
